entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 06:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -31.6°C
Wind: SE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:37 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:37 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
